nodes.text: The Nightmare Conjunction was said to have been tamed by Darth Krall, a former Jedi Master who fell to the dark side of the Force and became a Sith Lord. By the time of the High Republic Era, ancient records that dated back to the days of the Nightmare Conjunction included a mention of a star system by the name of Mulita. The story of Krall taming the Nightmare Conjunction was included in the holojournal of Klias Teradine, a Jedi Padawan who was supposedly expelled from the Jedi Order during the time of the High Republic.
The Nightmare Conjunction was first mentioned in the audio drama Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.
